content: CFS-MS Firestop metallic sleeve Conduit sleeve (1 diameter) with bushing and rigid attachment ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves ### FEATURES:Features Quick and easy to install for cable penetrations requiring a sleeved opening To be combined with other Hilti firestop solutions. Check UL systems available Up to 100% cable fill when used with CFS-D Firestop Disc Applications Cable penetrations for single and bundled cables For use on concrete, masonry and drywall Suitable for small circular openings in walls Electrical, low voltage / mid voltage and telecom ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2177231 - Firestop sleeve CFS-SL SK 1 - Package Size 2 pc - 3602104 - 1 Sleeve w/ Cable Disc Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 8x Firestop sleeve CFS-SL SK 1 - 32x CFS-D 1/25 Firestop putty disc
